contents: Here is the world, and you live in it, and are grateful. You try to be grateful.
Be happy for things that work.
Keep your Eyes on All that's Good and Beautiful and Possible in the World. Because "The Stories We Tell Create the People We Become.
Gratitude is where every positive attitude starts.
Joyful living is a healthy life.
Time is the most valuable resources.
The habit of happiness is achieved through the attitude of gratitude.
Revolution starts within our own heart, not on the street
The number one joy indicator, the one thing that will predict whether someone feels joy in their life or not, is the practice of gratitude.
May your life be filled with more gratitude.
What had she have to wish for? Nothing but to grow more worthy of him whose intentions and judgment had been ever so superior to her own.
The beauty of existence is a passionate sacred-life.
Be happy with what you have.
Gratefulness leads to good health and happy life.
Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
